answers.answer: If you have a healthy diet and you're still gaining fast I'd have to say that you're just gonna be one of those moms who gains a ton and loses it all at birth. It can also be a lot of water retention.
I did the same thing in the beginning....after that it slowed down tremendously! Only gained 18 lbs  now and im 27 weeks. Hopefully you will have the same luck

This is my second preg.I have gained 18 kg with first pregnancy.bt lost only 8 kg.10 kg are still here after4 yrs.this time I m gaining with the same speed like before.also had diastasis recti.showing huge at 16 weeks..pls suggest.

question: ,170cm tall,16 weeks pregnant.86 kg before pregnancy.now 93 kg.gained almost 15 lbs tillnow.no thyroid.no diabetes .having healthy diet too.what should I do.
title: overweight but still gaining fast
